about_the_game:
*This product contains the portion of the content from the full Custom PET Pack that is compatible with Mega Man Battle Network Collection Vol. 1.

A Special Skin
This skin lets you change the appearance of the 3D MegaMan on the Vol. 1 menu screen to HubStyle.


Two Rearranged Music Tracks
Adds two new music tracks to Vol. 1’s music player.

Note: Special skins have no effect on MegaMan’s appearance during gameplay.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 2GB or AMD Radeon RX 460 2GB
